abilities.ability1: Guided Hand: Once during each of your turns, if you draw a minion, reveal it, and then draw another card.
abilities.ability2: Reanimate: At the start of your turn, if you control less minions than your opponent, you can spend 2 lifeforce to resurrect a minion from your graveyard with a cost of 3 or less.
abilities.ability3: Press the Advantage: At the start of your turn, if you control more minions than your opponent, all your minions gain +1 attack this turn.
abilities.ability4: Corpse Explosion: Once during each of your turns, you may destroy a minion you control to deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.

traits: +1 Attack against heroes.
effects: Once per turn, when this card attacks and deals damage to a target, inflict 2 damage to an adjacent target.

traits: +1 Attack against heroes.
effects: If this minion attacks the enemy hero, it becomes invisible and untargetable until it attacks again or takes damage.

traits: +1 Attack against heroes.
effects: Inflict 1 extra damage to any target when attacking.

traits: +1 Attack against heroes.
effects: On summon, ensnare a minion in ice, preventing it from receiving Minion Commands for 1 round.

traits: +1 Attack against heroes.
effects: On summon, burn a target for 2 damage.

traits: +1 Attack against heroes.
effects: Once during each of your turns, you may summon a minion from your hand, deck, or graveyard with a cost 5 or less.

traits: +1 Attack against heroes.
effects: Once during each of your turns, burn a target for 2 damage.
Fire two ice bolts, each inflicting 1 damage and ensnaring their targets in ice, preventing them from taking Minion Commands for 1 round. This card can be played on any turn.
Summon any number of Skeleton minions from your hand, deck, or graveyard with a total cost of up to 10, paying the lifeforce for each.
Heal your hero for 6 health. This card can be played on any turn.
Inflict 1 damage to all enemy minions twice.
Negate and destroy an enemy magic card. This card can be played on any turn.
Inflict 3 damage to a target. If the target is destroyed, gain 1 lifeforce.
Inflict 3 damage to a target and 1 damage to all other characters.
Burn up to three different enemy targets for 3 damage each.
Resurrects a minion from your graveyard with a cost of 6 or less. The minion is destroyed if this card is destroyed.
Once during each of your turns, summon a Skeleton from your hand, deck or graveyard with a cost of 6 or less. If this card is destroyed so are all of the skeletons summoned this way.
Once during each of your turns, if a Skeleton is destroyed, you may summon a Skeleton minion from your hand, deck, or graveyard with a cost 6 or less.
Attach this to a minion. It gains 1 extra attack.
Attach this to a minion. It gains +3 attack.

abilities.ability1: Hell's Favor: The first minion you play each turn cost 2 less.
abilities.ability2: Soul Harvest: During your turn you can destroy friendly minions to gain 1 lifeforce for each. Their effects are negated.
abilities.ability3: Soul Weave: Once during each of your turns, you may spend 3 lifeforce to empower a minion, increasing its attack and defense by 2. The minion is destroyed at the end of the turn.
abilities.ability4: Dark Summoning: Once during each of your turns, you may spend 3 lifeforce to summon two 1 cost minions from your hand, deck or graveyard.

traits: Immune to piercing damage.
effects: When this minion attacks or is destroyed, it explodes, inflicting damage equal to its attack value to all enemy minions.

traits: On summon, burn a target for 1 damage.
effects: Burn the enemy Hero for 1 damage for each Demon on the field at the end of your turn.

traits: On summon, burn a target for 1 damage.
effects: Once per turn, when this minion attacks and deals damage, immediately burn two adjacent targets for 2 damage.

traits: On summon, burn a target for 2 damage.
effects: When this minion destroys a target, burn all enemy minions for 1 damage.

traits: On summon, burn a target for 2 damage.
effects: Once per turn, when this minion attacks and deals damage, immediately burn two adjacent targets for 2 damage.

effects: This minion can attack three different targets on the turn it is summoned.

effects: Inflict 2 extra damage when attacking a minion.

traits: On summon, burn a target for 2 damage.
effects: This minion receives 1 less damage from minion attacks.

traits: On summon, burn a target for 3 damage.
effects: Once per turn, when this minion attacks and deals damage, immediately burn two other minions for 2 damage.

When your minions are destroyed, attach them to this card instead of sending them to the graveyard. You can resummon them at the start of your next turn. If this card is destroyed, so are the attached minions.

When a friendly minion is destroyed, attach it to this card. When this card expires or is destroyed, summon a minion with a cost up to the total cost of all attached minions (max 10) from your hand, deck, or graveyard.
Once during each of your turns, empower a minion increasing its attack and defense by 3 until the end of your turn.
When this card is played, reveal and add two minions from your deck to your hand. While this card is on the field, your minions cost 2 less to summon.
Summon 3 Lost Souls from your hand, deck or graveyard.
Burn all enemy characters for 4 damage.
Target and destroy a minion. This card can be played on any turn.
Burn a target for 8 damage.
Draw a card during each of your turns.
Attach this card to an enemy minion to take control of it. If this card is destroyed, return the minion to its original owner's field. If their field is full, send it to their graveyard instead.
Attach this card to an enemy minion. Once during each of your turns, you can force it to attack all other enemy minions in any order.

abilities.ability1: Arcane Infusion: The first two spells you cast each round regenerate 1 lifeforce.
abilities.ability2: Witching Hour: You can cast spells at any time during either player's turn.
abilities.ability3: Conjure Familiar: Once during each of your turns, you may spend 3 lifeforce to summon a 2 or less cost minion from your deck or graveyard.
abilities.ability4: Occult Insight: Once during each of your turns, you may cast a spell with a cost of 5 or less from your deck by paying its cost plus an additional lifeforce.

Once during each of your turns, reveal a minion or spell from your deck and add it to your hand.
Once during each of your turns, look at the top three cards of your deck. You may put them back in any order, then draw a card.
Your spells cost 1 less lifeforce to cast.
Once during each of your turns, cast a spell from your graveyard, then remove it from the game.
Attach to a minion. It cannot be targeted by minion attacks, and its attacks cannot be defended against. This minion also cannot use the Defend Minion Command.
Once during each of your turns, summon a minion with a cost of 3 or less from your deck.
Inflict 2 damage to an enemy minion and reduce its attack by 2 until the end of the turn.

Negate and destroy an enemy magic card. This card can be played on any turn.
Summon up to 3 Witch minions from your hand, deck, or graveyard with a cost of 3 or less. You must pay the lifeforce cost of each Witch summoned this way.
Discard a card from your hand, then remove an enemy minion from the game.
Reduce an enemy minion's attack and defense to 1 until the end of the turn.
Inflict 4 damage to an enemy hero or minion.
Look at the hand of the enemy player and destroy a card.
Return up to two spell cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card. Deal damage to all enemy minions equal to the drawn card's lifeforce cost, up to a maximum of 5 damage.
Summon up to 4 Familiar minions from your deck or graveyard. You must pay the lifeforce cost of each Familiar summoned this way.
Twice per round, when you cast a spell, inflict 1 damage to all enemy minions.

abilities.ability1: Gain 1 health whenever a minion dies on your turn.
abilities.ability2: Once during each of your turns, you can cast the Draw or Destroy Magic Hero Abilities using Health instead of Lifeforce.
abilities.ability3: Once during each of your turns, you may spend 4 lifeforce to temporarily take control of an enemy minion. You take damage equal to that minion's lifeforce cost. At the end of your turn, return the minion to the opponent, regardless of its status.
abilities.ability4: Once during each of your turns, you may spend 6 lifeforce. The cards you play this turn cost health instead of lifeforce, up to 10 health.
